remarks: The right limit doesn't change if the function is restricted to a smaller open interval.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
limcresioolb.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
limcresioolb.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
limcresioolb.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR* ) $.
limcresioolb.bltc $e |- ( ph -> B < C ) $.
limcresioolb.bcss $e |- ( ph -> ( B (,) C ) C_ A ) $.
limcresioolb.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR* ) $.
limcresioolb.cled $e |- ( ph -> C <_ D ) $.
limcresioolb $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F |` ( B (,) C ) ) limCC B ) = ( ( F |` ( B (,) D ) ) limCC B ) ) $.
